subject: Re: Order #SSN3855 confirmed
description_text:
Hi there just recieved my order but got the wrong control box..

I have Simsonn plus pedals and not the pro x, therefore the control box I
recieved is useless.

How can we manage an exchange of control box?

Thanks for your support, I've spend many hundred of dollars for the whole
setup and it's frustrating not the have the proper control box.

conversations.body_text:
Hi there,
Just checking in on my previous note.

I received the control box from my order, though it doesn’t seem to match
the Simsonn Plus X pedals I’m using. I’d need the version that’s compatible
with that model.

Would it be possible to send the appropriate unit and I’ll return the one I
have now? Let me know the next steps.
Thanks for your help ?

[image: image.png]

On Tue, Dec 9, 2025 at 3:55 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi there, it's been 5 days since my initial request and can't have access
to the ticket hub to see the status of my request.

Can you give me an update here please?

Thanks for your help

On Thu, Dec 11, 2025, 3:34 p.m. Nicolas Villeneuve <nvilleneuve31@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hi there,
> Just checking in on my previous note.
>
> I received the control box from my order, though it doesn’t seem to match
> the Simsonn Plus X pedals I’m using. I’d need the version that’s compatible
> with that model.
>
> Would it be possible to send the appropriate unit and I’ll return the one
> I have now? Let me know the next steps.
> Thanks for your help ?
>
> [image: image.png]
>
> On Tue, Dec 9, 2025 at 3:55 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Nicolas Villeneuve,    Sorry for the delayed response. You can use the Pro X controller to manage your haptics and the original controller to manage your pedals.

Thnaks for the answer. I've connected everything as instructed now there's
no power at the motor.

Is it that's having the two box are not compatible?

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025, 9:13 p.m. service@simsonn.com

Nevermind found the problem, the load on my powered USB hub was to heavy

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025, 9:13 p.m. service@simsonn.com
